doc.title: Hard Damn Hitch
doc.plot: The gritty comedic tale of a prison escapee attempting to hitchhike home through the "treacherous" terrain of southern New Jersey. While juggling the tasks of slinking by the authorities and tolerating the people psychopathic enough to pick up a man garbed in an orange jumpsuit and handcuffs, our hero has to find the nerve and courage to make the long and arduous trip to northern New Jersey. This man's name is Jonathan Coleman, and this is his voyage of comedy intertwined with stark drama.
